content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37.0, y=-85.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Two burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0) and0)
- Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Mining & Smelting Complex at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0,-61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Transport belt system connecting mining to smelting
- Burner inserter at position (-26.5,-59.5)
- Wooden chest at position (-27.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnaces at positions (-27.0,-58.0), (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0)
- Output wooden chest at position (-24.5,-58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Additional burner inserters at positions (-20.5,-59.5), (-28.5,-57.5), (-22.5,-56.5)
- Output wooden chest at position (-22.5,-55.5) containing iron plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10.0, y=-59.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Transport belt system for ore movement
- Wooden chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing ore movement
- Connected to transport belt network

### Smelting & Assembly Line at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Six stone furnaces in two rows at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input wooden chests at positions (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output wooden chests at positions (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing material movement
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Power Generation System at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Steam engine at position (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at position (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric poles at various positions

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to harvest resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource before attempting to harvest
- Position yourself correctly relative to the target resource
- Verify the resource exists at the specified coordinates

### Fuel-related errors
- Multiple entities are showing "out of fuel" warnings
- Ensure all burner inserters and mining drills are supplied with fuel
- Implement a fuel distribution system to keep machinery running

### Connection and placement errors
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning - ensure proper pipe connections
- Verify fluid systems are properly connected between power generation components
- Check electrical connections between power poles and consuming entities

### Resource management
- Several inserters are "waiting for source items" - ensure proper supply chains
- Verify input/output container placement relative to inserters
- Check belt systems are properly connected and oriented
